titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that there should be established a Let's All Play Day.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Education Reform.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 9/27/2006--Introduced. Calls for establishment of a Let's All Play Day to: (1) support the goals and ideals of Boundless Playgrounds; and (2) celebrate play as an essential factor in creating opportunities for children to develop physical, social, and cognitive skills.
